Returns: True to update the state of the Preference with the new value.
Parameters: Object: The new value of the Preference.
onPreferenceChange(android.preference.Pr.Description: Called when a Preference has been changed by the user. This is called before the state of the Preference is about to be updated and before the state is persisted.
onPreferenceChange(android.preference.Pr.history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 29
onPreferenceChange(android.preference.Pr.FullName: public abstract boolean onPreferenceChange (Preference preference, Object newValue)

ClassDesc: Use the Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the value of this @B_android#preference#Preference_E@ has been changed by the user and is about to be set and/or persisted. This gives the client a chance to prevent setting and/or persisting the value.
